memberof.code_for_japan: Working as a event management intern. I'm running Civictech Challenge Cup 2020 now!
memberof.sgg: The student organization in Japan. If you want to join SGG, contact me on Twitter!

mywork.neornd: neornd makes Math.random() simple and safe by using crypto module. You can get a random number with number of decimal place you want easily.
mywork.multimd: Multi-MD is a markdown web editor. On Chrome, you can overwrite you local markdown file. PWA is available.
mywork.percom: Percom is a calculation npm module that is to simplify the calculation of permutations and combinations
mywork.syncmovie: On Syncmovie, you can watch YouTube videos with someone, and it will sync together. Besides, You can see how many people are connecting.
mywork.iso-639-1-jp: Conversion module of ISO-639 language code to Japanese name.
mywork.bullshit-trivia: Bullshit Trivia provides tidbits that you won't use for the rest of your life.
